reviewText:
This is a pretty great blu ray movie that is the finale to Liar Game. It doesnt really have any special features, but the english subtitles were surprisingly good and the picture quality was better than I thought it would be.

If you watched the show, this is definitely worth picking up to get a little more closure. The story is pretty much what you'd expect and the characters are fun and wacky just like the show. I enjoyed it just as much as the main show.

Also this blu ray works for region A players in case anyone needs to know. I did not experience any issues.
The quality is very good, the subtitles are clear and easy to read. The show itself is wonderful, to anyone who loves mental games and strategy this is a must watch.
The  movie is well translated and entertaining as expected of a Liar game film. The quality of the film is good.
